website_summaries.verdict: A fiber-based prebiotic that helps feed only the good bacteria in your gut to create a beneficial microbiome.
pros: Contains PreforPro and Preticx Xylooligosaccharide, which feed only the good bacteria
Vegan and non-GMO, dairy- and gluten-free
Third-party tested for safety and efficacy
IBS sufferers found relief with this prebiotic
cons: Pills are on the larger side
As with many prebiotics, select users report gas, bloating, and GI upset with use, though some of these problems resolve after regular use

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product - Awesome company
customer_reviews.text: I take one everyday with my probiotic. I also eat a keto diet, which is known to cause terrible constipation. Since I've been taking these, I'm "regular" everyday. Won't ever miss a dose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great prebiotic!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually post reviews, but felt like I should on this one. I was suffering from severe c diff colitis. I had been on antibiotics for 18 days with very little improvement. I was taking Florastor 4 times a day & Floajen as per a pharmacist’ recommendation. Now, I don’t know if this is a coincidence or this product, but within two days of taking this, I dramatically improved!! Either way, I will be taking it for a long time!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Very high-quality and effective combination when taken with sister probiotic. My doctor recommended probiotics and wrote me a script for one costing $80, which I later found out is available otc for $30 and is quite low on cfu :-o I prefer these because they're a stronger more effective cfu and I can feel them working, balancing out. bacteria which in turn reduces bloat and cravings for sweets.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: More energy less bloat
customer_reviews.text: I take the prebiotics with the probiotics. I feel less tired, not bloated, and my bathroom trips are more regular now.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey LeFevre

customer_reviews.title: Never took prebiotics before
customer_reviews.text: Been taking probiotics for years did not think I needed prebiotics at all. But I was starting to see that I was increasing my probiotics to get the same results. Than I read about prebiotic these are wonderful, it does make a difference to take these before your probiotic. I now take less probiotic when taking the prebiotics. My gut health is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Seng1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to the probiotic!
customer_reviews.text: Basically, all foods make me feel sick from time to time. I started taking Bio Schwartz prObiotics about 2-3 months ago, and I loved them. Adding these prEbiotics to the mix honest helped even more, and I’m so satisfied with these products. It makes me feel like I’m really maximizing my probiotic. I feel better than ever. I’ll keep buying both forever.
customer_reviews.author: K Fied

customer_reviews.title: Definitely cause action in my gut.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I am taking a prebiotic and since I have been using BioSchwartz Advanced Probiotic I thought I would give them a try. I must say they definitely cause action in my gut. I take a pill in the morning and about two hours later there is gurgling and rumbling in my abdomen. The prebiotic is working for me. I haven't experience any aftertaste or difficulty swallowing the pills. Not sure as time passes if the activity in my gut will lessen with a constant supply of beneficial microorganisms coming in.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette G.

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: After several trips to the doctor lately and having ultrasounds and blood work for my digestive complaints, I watched a video by Dr. Gundry explaining the need for both prebiotics & probiotics. I started these 4 days ago but by the 2nd day I was feeling much better and less bloated. I didn’t have that weird feeling in my upper belly area. I would’ve given 5 stars but want to continue for a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: P. Evans

customer_reviews.title: IBS-C Sufferer -- This is a must buy
customer_reviews.text: I've had IBS-C for many, many years and have taken my fair share of laxatives for relief. Recently I began to feel extremely bloated, which can be a side effect of certain laxatives. Tired of feeling like I was 8 months pregnant, I took another chance on probiotics after having taking them before with no results. However, taking these prebiotics in conjunction with their probiotics has really worked. I'm not bloated and I am having normal BMs. I take 2 prebiotics and 1 probiotic first thing and take the remaining probiotic around dinner (per instructions).
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Helps keep me healthy
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It helps my diverticulosis from getting infected. Very easy on my stomach. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Works for my health problem
customer_reviews.text: I have eczema and changing my eating habits does not seem to be enough, including a probiotic regiment. This prebiotic does wonders and made my probiotic regiment more effective. Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: LumiWolfi

customer_reviews.title: What a waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: I received a notice from Amazon that there is an issue with this product. Looks like we have totally wasted out money since it appears the return window has closed. This is the second recent notice I have received regarding issues with supplements. I am beginning to wonder if such products are a waste of money. We don't have the luxury of wasting our hard-earned income on supplements that are unsafe or simply don't work. Very frustrating to say the least!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Sylvestre

customer_reviews.title: Worth trying!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been struggling with stomach issues for several months now and someone recommended pro and prebiotics. After plenty of research, this one seemed to be everything I was looking for. Happy to report that some of my stomach issues are not nearly as bad after just a few weeks. I'll continue to see if they resolve entirely :) Great product overall and great customer service too.
customer_reviews.author: np4gp

customer_reviews.title: PreticX - PreforPro AND Oryza sativa (a resistant starch)
customer_reviews.text: I had another Prebiotic that was good, but I like this one so much better. My other one only had the ingredients for the PreforPro. I feel like this one works better. My skin did start breaking out a bit at the beginning, but that's pretty typical for detoxing (increase in good bacteria - others starving to death and moving on out). Clearing now, I feel like this one just works better on the whole for my body and probably yours too since the ingredients are broader in scope for gut health.
customer_reviews.author: quantumspock

customer_reviews.title: It keeps urinary track infections in check
customer_reviews.text: I take 2 a day and it keeps me regular. I would not travel without it.
customer_reviews.author: barneywilma

customer_reviews.title: Digestive health
customer_reviews.text: Prebiotics for advanced gut health is very important to me. Since using Bio Schwartz Prebiotics i have not had that bloated feeling i use to get. I feel better knowing that my gut is receiving what it needs. Less worry about leaky gut.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas A. Gileno

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve needed to use several probiotics for years due to having MS, but I used a really bad tasting prebiotic in the past. I discovered this through research on the internet while trying to switch to pills from powdered form. This did not disappoint. I go like clockwork and it does what it said it would do. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Folake Taylor

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have IBS and after reading the reviews and trying so many suppliments I stopped my current suppliments to try this one and another to go with it. Same brand too. Did not and will not finish the bottle. Just didn't do what I needed it to do for me and that is help control my IBS.
customer_reviews.author: Sgrplm

customer_reviews.title: Digestion process is working better
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure how this would work or if it would but I did notice a difference in my digestion on the days I took it. I don’t get pain in my stomach from something I ate and I don’t burp as much after eating. I also noticed it makes me regular. I take 2 once a day. I am going to try it again just because I noticed a difference! I haven’t noted the same change by taking probiotics.
customer_reviews.author: Jamanee

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This prebiotic immediately started working in my colon. I could feel movement in my upper colon which never happens. I found that my bowel movements were beginning to change for the Better. I’ll keep using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Augustine

customer_reviews.title: It's a game changer for me!
customer_reviews.text: I've only been taking these supplements for a few days but I've noticed a significant already. I sure hope they continue work, if so, I'll definitely being purchasing again. I will update after taking for a couple of weeks. Keeping my fingers crossed that they continue work as well as they seem to be.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy G

customer_reviews.title: Complete your probiotic routine!
customer_reviews.text: This has definitely upped my probiotic game! I wasn’t sure it was really doing anything for me until I stopped taking it. All of my symptoms returned. Once I added it again worked like a charm. Very high quality supplement. Will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Karen K.

customer_reviews.title: Warning contains Sativa
customer_reviews.text: Why does this have Sativa in it? Isn’t that a type of weed... I had a horrible reaction from this. There should be a warning that this has that ingredient. Also, Sativa is an upper and can give you anxiety in some cases because anything that ups your energy can do that if you have it. I cannot believe this. DONT RECOMMEND THIS BRAND OR PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Rose

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Gut!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely satisfied with your prebiotic! I did Viome and they recommended both a pre and a pro. I bought both from Bio-Schwartz through Amazon. I have been taking them for about a month and never felt better! I am about to order my second month and am very happy with the quality of both products. I think I will end up a customer for life!
customer_reviews.author: Cris Trulsson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to my routine
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly with my Probiotics. It is easy to swallow and uses ingredients that other brands that are more expensive do. The customer service team was also very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: BigDaddy

customer_reviews.title: Effective product...
customer_reviews.text: Drug induced diarrhea _ apparently permanent. Their actual site indicates, that though rare (ha), this may happen. I’d been using another product but this one is better. I also use their pro-biotic. Work well. I would like price to be lower since I’m not sure if I’ll ever be able to stop using them.
customer_reviews.author: Marm

customer_reviews.title: That it really works.
customer_reviews.text: I felt I had an army in my intestines and I no longer hear or feel. I am so thankful for this product as it was awful lying in bed at night and have all this rumbling going on. It took about two weeks to eliminate thi s and I definitely will continue with Advanced Prebiotic product. It really works.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne J Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Really works on me
customer_reviews.text: Excellent... works perfect... I’ve been suffering of lack constipation for very long time and I was taking medication very expensive... and switch with this great prebiotic... I’m happy taking every day and my digestion is normal finally... thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Juana Velasquez

customer_reviews.title: As a general rule... Prebiotics > Probiotics
customer_reviews.text: Gut science is in its infancy. Until we know which specific strains of bacteria are healthiest for which individual biomes, it stands to reason that prebiotics will be a better bet than probiotics to encourage the gut to do what it does best. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C.B.

customer_reviews.title: I feel much better now
customer_reviews.text: After several months of chemotherapy, my body was severely dehydrated and I had severe digestive issues with my colon. After trying a number of laxatives, someone recommended a probiotic and prebiotic that might help to restore my digestive tract. It worked and now things are moving along smoothly once again.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Bell

customer_reviews.title: Prebiotics
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Gentle on my stomach. I can feel the difference. I'll definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Gail

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Premium ingredients advanced prebiotics with preforpro and preticx arrived well packaged and in perfect condition. I've been taking it for a month and I haven't have any adverse effects. As far as I can tell, the product is working as intended and my gut health feels better.

customer_reviews.title: I didn't taste anything
customer_reviews.text: I have Diverticulosis, not to be confused with Diverticulitis. Any way, I have serious problems with my digestion and have tried everything...except probiotics and prebiotics. I was doing good with just probiotics but then something changed, I suppose my body figured it out so it was suggested I add prebiotics. I just took my two and already I feel the difference but I'm not holding my breath just yet. I hope this works, I'm tired of hiding in my home alone.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R Taylor

customer_reviews.title: This review is about to be tmi
customer_reviews.text: I think this is my second week on their pre and probiotic and I gotta say that I’m not regular at all. A little TMI but the first few days of having prebiotic, I had some bleeding or something going on, which is very unusual. I got these to help with bloating and other stomach issues but it seems like it’s giving me more problems that I had wanted. I can honestly return these products but I feel bad that I had already taken a few weeks worth of it :/
customer_reviews.author: Eternal Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: We use these now in addition to probiotics!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using probiotics for years...at least 10 years. But after reading articles, I decided to add prebiotics to our regimen. We have been very pleased. It has really made an improvement in gut issues! There would have to be an improvement to order again, and we will continue to use them!
customer_reviews.author: janet

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: I added these a month ago and my digestion has improved.
customer_reviews.author: K Garner

customer_reviews.title: Great for gut health!
customer_reviews.text: This product definitely helped with my digestive system. I am a Celiac and chronic pain sufferer so my system does not always work great. This product coupled with probiotic helped the digestive process along.
customer_reviews.author: Jaye

customer_reviews.title: I love this prebiotic!
customer_reviews.text: My stomach feels so much better since taking this prebiotic. I've been taking a probiotic through the VA for over a year now, but it wasn't until I added this advanced prebiotic that my stomach came alive. It really made a difference for me. I strongly recommend this product! I'm set up on a monthly subscription through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: Good quality prebiotics
customer_reviews.text: I have used the bioschwartz probiotics for a long time and wanted to try the probiotics as my diet is likely missing them. I still prefer the probiotics, as I see a huge difference when I take them (better GI system). I see less of a difference with these, but I still believe that they are a good addition to a diet and this is a reliable brand. I will continue to research the benefits of prebiotics and will likely continue to see more benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Amnis

customer_reviews.title: Bloated and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Made me more bloated and uncomfortable than I already was
customer_reviews.author: Candie Wageman

customer_reviews.title: False statement - feeds only the good bacteria - NOT
customer_reviews.text: WHY would a company put sugar in a prebiotic when we know that bad bacteria FEEDS on sugar???????
customer_reviews.author: Susie Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Great prebiotic!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son since it is dairy free. He has been taking it for months. It seems to help regulate his sensitive system. He hasn't been having as much stomach pain as he once was.
customer_reviews.author: K. Dann

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product for me.
customer_reviews.text: Did not like product, made me sick.may work for someone else, but not me.
customer_reviews.author: C&E Kersey

customer_reviews.title: Working so far
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to try and control my hunger pangs and after almost a month, it appears to be doing so. I'll continue to take it for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: K Reagan

customer_reviews.title: don't work
customer_reviews.text: I've had great results from other prebiotics. Will not be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Miraculous for me
customer_reviews.text: For about five weeks after starting taking the prebiotic my digestive tract was becoming accustomed to it so caused some mild distress of various kinds. But after that! This is the first time in decades (if not my entire adult life) that my digestive tract has worked well! I have had trouble with constipation for a very long time but now things are working well. Chronic constipation is no fun at all and having things working better than I even knew was possible is delightful. Thank you so very much.
customer_reviews.author: oddlovely

customer_reviews.title: for us it worked better than other brands.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I both have been very happy with our intestinal health since we started this particular brand of Prebiotic. We sometimes get unsettled stomach and after trying several probiotics we noticed a much more settled feeling after adding this. We tried several different ones, but we love bioSchwartz products, this is the first probiotic of theirs have used. Their cucurmin is awesome so we gave this a shot.
customer_reviews.author: pattie r.

customer_reviews.title: If your belly is happy you will be happy!
customer_reviews.text: I will give this product five stars! It really helped with my digestion and feeling good . I started taking it to combat candida. And I am so grateful for this product and how it made me feel! Thank you I will continue to take to keep feeling good.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work well for me

product_meta.title: Prebiotics for Advanced Gut Health - Immune System Booster & Dietary Fiber - Fuels Good Bacteria Growth to Promote Digestive Health, Gas Relief & Digestion - Probiotics Support for Men & Women - 60ct
feature_bullets: CLINICALLY PROVEN RESULTS - BioSchwartz Advanced Prebiotic contains a blend of PreforPro and PreticX prebiotic fibers that work better than inulin powder and other digestive enzymes to create your perfect microbiome. This allows for better absorption of nutrients and essential amino acids. Selective prebiotics support an increase of healthful Bifidobacteria while inhibiting growth of undesirable microorganisms in the digestive tract.

SUPPORTS DIGESTIVE HEALTH- Bloating, diarrhea and other intestinal issues affect many every day. BioSchwartz Advanced Prebiotics works in both intestinal areas of the body and is efficacious within hours. This supplement nourishes the flora of the intestinal lining to help promote regularity and ease occasional discomfort such as gas and bloating. When used with BioSchwartz Probiotics, they can promote good bacteria growth that supports overall digestive health to reduce these symptoms.

HEALTHY MICROBIOME LEADS TO HEALTHIER LIVES - A healthy gut can help with cholesterol and blood sugar levels while also giving a boost to your immune response. It can also help with overall mood boost and weight loss management!

DAIRY & GLUTEN FREE, NO REFRIGERATION REQUIRED & MADE IN USA - Our unique prebiotics supplement is manufactured in the USA in a cGMP, state-of-the-art facility. Every batch is third-party tested to ensure the ingredients are safe, pure and potent. We pride ourselves on our superior ingredients.
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: Feel more in balance with BioSchwartz Advanced Prebiotic or your money back, no questions asked!
